promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare tortoise water-type pokemon wearing cyan glittering gemstones. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or tortoise. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemquatic, a a chibi cute rare tortoise water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Hydro Punch, Licking-Licking Heal. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "tortoise", "water" or "Gemquatic". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, tortoise-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: This precious shell-encrusted critter thrives in aquatic paradises. Noted for its Hydro Punch and Licking-Licking Heal powers, it's often sighted playfully skipping across ocean waves.
